description:
Noah is all business.
The thing that struck me most about this cutie was the matter-of-fact way he answered my questions with a very crisp "yes" or "no". He just didn't seem like he found the situation all that unusual.
When he first came into the studio, I noticed that he was immediately eyeing our porn collection. So, I told him to go over and pick out a video, which he did. He put it on and quickly found a scene with a cute blonde girl and that immediately got him going.
Noah's pubes were shaved completely off. As a preference, I really wish guys wouldn't do that, but I'm guessing they see it in porn videos and think that's what is wanted. Oh well...
title: Noah
